name: bfin
description: BFIN - Banking Finance - Sistema de gerenciamento financeiro pessoal

scripts.start: npm run docker:up && npm run install:all && npm run db:setup && npm run dev
scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.stop: npm run kill:servers && npm run docker:down
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: Igor Guariroba
